General.Name: Qingdao Richen Food Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao Richen Food Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of compound seasoning and condiments for food processing and catering companies in China. It offers liquid and powder seasonings, roast chicken seasoning, sauces, coating flour, and coating paste, as well as food additive products that include compound acidity regulator, compound moisture retaining agent, caramel color, etc., which are used in various processed food additions. The company also provides fried rice seasoning and tempura breaded; black pepper sauce, BBQ sauce, colorful barbecue sauce, and steak sauce with wine flavor; beef bone, seafood, tonkotsu, chicken, tomato, and spicy ramen soup seasoning; twice cooked and braised pork seasoning; and spicy, collagen, and mushroom flavor hot pot partner, as well as prepared food. Its products are used in various types of barbecue, fried food, and prepared food production. In addition, the company provides services to the domestic food market, as well as a range of product solutions for various supermarkets and catering chain enterprises under the Flavor Story brand; and export food processing companies of livestock and poultry products, aquatic products, vegetable products, etc. It exports its products primarily to Asia, Europe, and the United States. Qingdao Richen Food Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Qingdao, China. Qingdao Richen Food Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Qingdao Boya Investment Holding Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Qingdao Environmental Protection Ind. Pa, Qingdao, China, 266200
